actions.message: 📡Transfering assistance data into your dms
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
`.incognite {message}` 
Sends an anonymous message into the channel the command was used in

`.poll {poll question}` 
Sends an embed poll into the channel the command was used in

`.dm {message}` 
Sends a DM to the mentioned user

`.embed {title} {message}`
Sends an embed message with custom text in it

`.suggest {suggestion}`
Sends a suggestion into a preset channel that users can vote for.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
`.clear {message count}`
Deletes a set amount of message in the channel that the command was used in.

`.kick {user mention}`
Kicks the mentioned user from the server 

`.ban {user mention}`
Bans the mentioned user from the server

`.mute {user mention} {duration in minutes} {reason}`
Blocks the user from being able to send messages on the server for a specified amount of time
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
`.giverole {user mention} {role name}`
Gives a role to the mentioned user

`.color-role-setup`
Creates 8 roles with different colors 

`.admin-dm {user mention}{message}`
Sends a DM to the mentioned user [without introduction process]

`create-text {name}`
Creates a text channel with a custom name

`create-voice {name}`
Creates a voice channel with a custom name

`embed {1 word title} {color} {description}`
Sends a custom embed embed message

`.announce {channel mention} {title} {message}`
Makes an announcement for the server without mentioning everyone

`.ping-announce {channel mention} {title} {message}`
Makes an announcement in a mentioned channel with ghost mentioning everyone

`.nuke {channel mention}`
Deletes all messages in mentioned channel

`.lockdown`
Makes the channel read only

`.unlock`
Lets users chat in the channel

`.mute-setup`
Sets up a Muted role, that is required for the .mute command to work

`.suggestions {channel mention}`
Sets a channel that all suggestions will be sent to and voted for.

`.pr`
Toggles the ¨persistant roles¨. If a user leaves a server and rejoins the server, he will receive the roles, that he had before leaving
actions.name: Set Embed Description
